message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your offer was a bit too much in your favor, Alice. How about a split that's closer to the middle? This is my counter offer.
I can meet you a bit closer to the middle, but I still think I deserve the bigger share.
Alice, the clock is ticking and the money is losing value. This is my final offer.  It's a reasonable split, and any further delays will only hurt us both.
